summary: Diff adds a full frontend portfolio layout with navigation and sections (Hero/About/Services/Work/Testimonials/Contact), themed styling, projects/contact config data sources, and safe external links. However, the required generated image filenames/paths do not match the BuildRequest, and additional Internet Identity/auth-related hooks were introduced despite not being required.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and include the required static images under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact required filenames and reference them from the UI (hero-bg.dim_1600x900.png, logo-mark.dim_512x512.png, section-divider.dim_2000x300.png).
missing_requirements.reason: UI references /assets/generated/hero-bg.png, /assets/generated/logo-mark.png, and /assets/generated/section-divider.png (different names/extensions than specified). The diff summary does not provide evidence that the exact required image files exist under frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Added Internet Identity authentication/provider and actor-creation hooks (useInternetIdentity/useActor) even though third-party auth is a non-goal and Internet Identity is explicitly 'not required for this portfolio'.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for authentication or identity management; adding these hooks and provider is extra scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Added footer attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM parameters.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest requirements or acceptance criteria; introduces additional outbound branding link.
